Docs.summary: Class for exposing the native RenderScript rs_matrix4x4 type back to the Android system.

remarks.para: Class for exposing the native RenderScript rs_matrix4x4 type back to the Android system.
This member is deprecated. Renderscript has been deprecated in API level 31. Please refer to the migration guide for the proposed alternatives.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Set current values to be an orthographic projection matrix with the right and bottom clipping planes set to the given values.
